topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
Man; video games take a ton of fucking work.

This weekend I have to finish up two chapters of C++ programming, make several actual programs, finish up my 3d models for the week, create the textures for it, finish up the short game I'm working on and put it in a format that you can actually play. . and that's not counting the trying to find all the bugs in the code.

Making video games in actuality:
20% learning programming, 20% learning animation, 20% modeling, 99% wondering why the fuck your program isn't working, 10% alcohol.

topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539cb2596368721870a10000#post_539cb2596368721870a10000
Ah crap; derpibooru ate my post.


Actually it's a crossover pun.

The character is "Cirno" from touhou.  Cirno constantly describes herself as being the "strongest" or "mighty" when in actuality she's extremely weak.  This has caused people to nickname her ⑨; which is essentially calling her a idiot.  So how she calls herself "mighty" plus how people call her "⑨".


Cirno is to Touhou as Yamcha is to dragonballz.
"Oh hey Cirno's here! (boom sound effects) Oh no!  Cirno's been Yamcha'd!"

Tl:dr; Lovable idiot character in crossover fanart.

topics.body:
I don't think making a Homestuck General thread would be an entirely good idea.  There are many in this fandom that casually like it, and a bunch that _loudly_ hate it.
I'm one of those that casually likes it, but I'm not one to make threads
